select t.DETAILID, t.DEVICEID, t.OPERATEEMPID, TO_CHAR(t.OPERATETIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') as OPERATETIME , t.DEVICENAME, t.DEVICEMODEL, t.IPADRESS, t.PRODUCTIONMACHINENAME, t.CPUCODE, t.MEMORY, t.HARDDISK , t.OSVERSION, t.SOFTWAREVERSION, t.IEVERSION, t.USEFUL, t.TERMINALNUMBER, t.USERS, t.PLUGIN, t.PERIPHERAL , t.OTHERATTRIBUTE_1, t.OTHERATTRIBUTE_2, t.OTHERATTRIBUTE_3, t.OTHERATTRIBUTE_4, t.OTHERATTRIBUTE_5 , t.OTHERINFO_1, t.OTHERINFO_2, t.OTHERINFO_3, t.OTHERINFO_4, t.OTHERINFO_5 , t.REMARKS_1, t.REMARKS_2, t.REMARKS_3, t.REMARKS_4, t.REMARKS_5 , t.ORGCODE, t.DEVICE_STATE , o.orgname, e.empname as operateEmpname from t_new_deviceManDetail t , om_organization o, om_employee e where t.orgcode = o.orgcode and t.operateEmpid = e.empid and t.DEVICEID = #deviceId:DECIMAL#
e.empname like '%'|| #operateEmpname# ||'%'
order by t.operateTime desc
